hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EWRI_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, SITE_NAME, EWRI_ORDER_NO, EWRI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EWRI_DOWNSTREAM_NO, EWRI_CODE, EWRI_NAME, EWRI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EWRI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EWRI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EWRI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EWRI_UNDO_QUANTITY, EWRI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EWRI_QUANTITY, EWRI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EWRI_NET_WEIGHT, EWRI_VOLUME, EWRI_REMARK, EWRI_LINK_PM_CODE, EWRI_LOTATT01, EWRI_LOTATT02, EWRI_LOTATT03, EWRI_LOTATT04, EWRI_LOTATT05, EWRI_LOTATT06, EWRI_LOTATT07, EWRI_LOTATT08, EWRI_LOTATT09, EWRI_LOTATT10, EWRI_LOTATT11, EWRI_LOTATT12, EWRI_SCHEDULING_QUANTITY, EWRI_SHIPPING_QUANTITY, EWRI_SIGN_QTY, EWRI_REAL_OUT_QUANTITY, EWRI_REAL_IN_QUANTITY, EWRI_UNIT_QUANTITY, EWRI_UNIT_GROSS_WEIGHT, EWRI_UNIT_VOLUME, EWRI_UPSTREAM_LINE_NO, EWRI_LOC_CODE, EWRI_TRACE_NO, EWRI_MAIN_GOODS_CODE, EWRI_REVERSAL_REASON, EWRI_EXPRESS_NO, EWRI_SUBSTR1, EWRI_SUBSTR2, EWRI_SUBSTR3, EWRI_SUBSTR4, EWRI_SUBDATE1, EWRI_SUBDATE2, EWRI_SUBNUM1, EWRI_SUBNUM2, EWRI_REJECT_QUANTITY, EWRI_CANCEL_QUANTITY FROM EO_WORK_RECYCLE_ITEM WHERE 1=1 <<AND EWRI_ID LIKE :ewriId>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE :companyName>> <<AND SITE_NAME LIKE :siteName>> <<AND EWRI_ORDER_NO LIKE :ewriOrderNo>> <<AND EWRI_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :ewriWorkOrderNo>> <<AND EWRI_DOWNSTREAM_NO LIKE :ewriDownstreamNo>> <<AND EWRI_CODE LIKE :ewriCode>> <<AND EWRI_NAME LIKE :ewriName>> <<AND EWRI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE LIKE :ewriPackageTypeCode>> <<AND EWRI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME LIKE :ewriPackageTypeName>> <<AND EWRI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE LIKE :ewriPackageUnitCode>> <<AND EWRI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME LIKE :ewriPackageUnitName>> <<AND EWRI_UNDO_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriUndoQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriPackageQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_GROSS_WEIGHT LIKE :ewriGrossWeight>> <<AND EWRI_NET_WEIGHT LIKE :ewriNetWeight>> <<AND EWRI_VOLUME LIKE :ewriVolume>> <<AND EWRI_REMARK LIKE :ewriRemark>> <<AND EWRI_LINK_PM_CODE LIKE :ewriLinkPmCode>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT01 > :ewriLotatt01From>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT01 <= :ewriLotatt01To + 1>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT02 > :ewriLotatt02From>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT02 <= :ewriLotatt02To + 1>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT03 > :ewriLotatt03From>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT03 <= :ewriLotatt03To + 1>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT04 LIKE :ewriLotatt04>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT05 LIKE :ewriLotatt05>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT06 LIKE :ewriLotatt06>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT07 LIKE :ewriLotatt07>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT08 LIKE :ewriLotatt08>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT09 LIKE :ewriLotatt09>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT10 LIKE :ewriLotatt10>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT11 LIKE :ewriLotatt11>> <<AND EWRI_LOTATT12 LIKE :ewriLotatt12>> <<AND EWRI_SCHEDULING_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriSchedulingQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_SHIPPING_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriShippingQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_SIGN_QTY LIKE :ewriSignQty>> <<AND EWRI_REAL_OUT_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriRealOutQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_REAL_IN_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriRealInQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_UNIT_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriUnitQuantity>> <<AND EWRI_UNIT_GROSS_WEIGHT LIKE :ewriUnitGrossWeight>> <<AND EWRI_UNIT_VOLUME LIKE :ewriUnitVolume>> <<AND EWRI_UPSTREAM_LINE_NO LIKE :ewriUpstreamLineNo>> <<AND EWRI_LOC_CODE LIKE :ewriLocCode>> <<AND EWRI_TRACE_NO LIKE :ewriTraceNo>> <<AND EWRI_MAIN_GOODS_CODE LIKE :ewriMainGoodsCode>> <<AND EWRI_REVERSAL_REASON LIKE :ewriReversalReason>> <<AND EWRI_EXPRESS_NO LIKE :ewriExpressNo>> <<AND EWRI_SUBSTR1 LIKE :ewriSubstr1>> <<AND EWRI_SUBSTR2 LIKE :ewriSubstr2>> <<AND EWRI_SUBSTR3 LIKE :ewriSubstr3>> <<AND EWRI_SUBSTR4 LIKE :ewriSubstr4>> <<AND EWRI_SUBDATE1 > :ewriSubdate1From>> <<AND EWRI_SUBDATE1 <= :ewriSubdate1To + 1>> <<AND EWRI_SUBDATE2 > :ewriSubdate2From>> <<AND EWRI_SUBDATE2 <= :ewriSubdate2To + 1>> <<AND EWRI_SUBNUM1 LIKE :ewriSubnum1>> <<AND EWRI_SUBNUM2 LIKE :ewriSubnum2>> <<AND EWRI_CANCEL_QUANTITY LIKE :ewriCancelQuantity>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
